main event: A ground-radar observation of one object with a bright light trail was reported in Madras, Oregon on 17 August 1958.
interesting points: The object was observed for 2 minutes,The object fell southwest after an explosion,Three civilians reported the sighting to a patrolman,The light trail from the object faded after the event,The sighting coincides with periodic meteoric showers.
sighted object: one object with a bright light trail
